about_the_game:
WHAMPUNCH !

Superpowered Punch is a first-person superpower action game that delivers an exhilarating combat experience. Players can unleash devastating abilities and engage in earth-shattering battles against legendary superpowered opponents!

This demo includes:

  • Around 30 minutes of high-speed, fast-paced combat

  • Three immersive levels, from the collapsing Golden Gate Bridge to a towering sky city, and finally, a heavily fortified military stronghold where the boss awaits

  • Four elite enemy encounters and one intense boss battle

  • Two distinct playstyles (Fist and Lightning), featuring six attack abilities (light, heavy, and ultimate attacks for each style)

=========================================================================

WHAM! Punch enemies to the building and destroy it !

《WhamPunch》 is a first-person superpowered combat game that focuses on high-speed battles, environmental destruction, and uniquely designed levels.

GAME FEATURE

  • Fight using your fists—charge up your punches to send enemies flying with shockwaves and air pressure, creating exaggerated knockback effects. Smash them into buildings, causing massive explosions and large-scale environmental destruction.

  • Almost all enemies and NPCs can be punched into the air, and most buildings in the world can be destroyed—from streetlights and water towers to even skyscrapers and mountains.

SUPERPOWER BATTLE

Defeat enemies to gain new abilities and unlock different combat styles.

Players can acquire three distinct superpowers: Force, Lightning, and Fire.

  • Force enables powerful melee combos with devastating impact.

  • Lightning summons thunderbolts to weaken enemy resilience.

  • Fire unleashes explosive attacks to break enemy shields.

SUPERPOWER ENEMIES

Engage in brutal combat against different types of superpowered foes.

The game features around 10 unique boss fights and elite enemies, each possessing their own special abilities.

  • Some are as fast as lightning, making them hard to hit.

  • Some command thunder, summoning devastating strikes at will.

  • Some possess immense physical strength and can send the player flying.

  • Some are enhanced by technology, wielding advanced firearms and energy weapons.

To succeed, players must adapt their strategies and make the most of their superpowers to counter each enemy’s abilities.

WORLDS & LEVELS

Use your powers to defeat enemies or complete challenges, then enter a portal to progress to the next level.

Explore diverse, linear levels—

From towering cyberpunk neon cities to decaying post-apocalyptic ruins. Leap between floating islands inspired by Eastern mythology, or use your abilities to launch yourself like a rocket, navigating through satellite cities in the upper atmosphere. Master your powers to reach and explore every corner of each level.

《WhamPunch》is a solo-developed indie game, aiming to create a brand-new first-person superpowered combat experience.

We’d love to hear your feedback and support through Discord, X (Twitter), or other social media!

Thank you!
